doc.title: Enigma: Exorcism
doc.plot: Demonic possession-the frontline in the eternal battle of good vs. evil. Around the world in widely varying cultures, millions of people believe that the devil and demons can possess a human body. Thousands of cases are reported each year. Are such cases real? Or are the answers to such troubling cases found in the more prosaic realm of human psychology? While examining the influence of religion, faith and psychology, Enigma: Exorcism will expose the realities of the fascinating world of demonic possession.
